entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
